dashboard-info: Welcome to the dashboard of the citizen portal. Here you have the possibility to offer your own articles, companies or various services. Furthermore, you can train our AI.

settings-messages.success: Your setting has been successfully changed.

title: Title
training-information: Thank you for helping us make our search even more efficient and better. Below you will find all the information for input and the resulting training for our artificial intelligence search.

training-messages.success: Training successfully added. We will train our AI with it soon. Thank you very much

translate-item.title: Translate text
translate-item.subtitle: Here you can set all available languages.

welcome-message: Welcome to the new intelligent citizen portal.

text1.title: Citizen portal of the future
text1.description: This project was developed by Nils-Christopher Wiesenauer on behalf of evia solutions GmbH during the 3rd and 4th semester as part of the project T2000. The main purpose of this web application is the conceptual design and development of a citizen portal with an integrated artificial intelligence.

text2.title: Artificial Intelligence
text2.description: Brain.js is used to extend the citizen portal with an intelligent search. Brain.js is a GPU-accelerated neural network library written in JavaScript. This is a continuation of the simple JavaScript neural network library developed by harthur called brain, which is no longer maintained.

text3.title: Dashboard
text3.description: To improve the knowledge of artificial intelligence and thus the search results, you can easily create an account. In addition, the possibility exists to register your own companies and publish articles. We wish you a lot of fun with it.

text4.title: Corona
text4.description: Get information about the current case numbers as well as info and relaxations about the respective city and district in Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg. Every day we update our data with the latest ones provided by the Robert Koch Institute (RKI) and the Center for System Science and Engineering (CSSE) at John Hopkins University.

feature1.title: Company
feature1.description: This project was developed on behalf of evia solutions GmbH.

feature2.title: GitHub
feature2.description: The repository and associated source code is located on GitHub.

feature3.title: Twitter
feature3.description: Information and news about the project can be found on Twitter.

corona-content.title: Current numbers in Baden-Wuerttemberg
corona-content.information: Figures from state authorities and counties may differ from RKI due to reporting delays.

username-or-email-required: Please enter an email address or username.
username-or-email-min-max: The input must be between 3 and 100 characters long.
username-min-max: The username must be between 3 and 25 characters long.
username-invalid: The username must contain only letters from a-ZA-Z and numbers from 0-9.
e-mail-min-max: The e-mail address must be between 3 and 100 characters long.
e-mail-invalid: The specified e-mail address is invalid.
e-mail-valid: The e-mail address entered is valid.

login-messages.error: No account with the specified data could be found.
